metadata.title: CVE-2017-17536 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Phabricator before 2017-11-10 does not block the --config and --debuggerflags to the Mercurial hg program, which allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code by using the web UI to browse a branch whose name beginswith a --config= or --debugger= substring.

criterions.comment: phabricator: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
